description.p: Advanced Charting component for the visualization of Business, Scientific, Financial and Presentation charts.

ul.li: Complete set of 2D and 3D Charting types.
Axes with support for different scaling modes, smart-labels, scale-breaks, titles etc.
Interactivity features such as zooming, scrolling, tooltips, hit-tests, etc.
Import and bind to data from numerous data sources.
Create high-quality raster and vector chart images.
Printing and PDF export.
OpenGL hardware acceleration.

description.p: Advanced Diagramming component that helps you display Flowcharts, Org Charts, UML Diagrams, Family Trees, Business Diagrams, HMI Interfaces and many other.

ul.li: Smart-Shapes driven by formulas.
Intelligent Routable Connectors with Line-Jumps
Advanced Rich Text features. Table shapes.
Microsoft Visio Compatiblity – open, edit and save Visio Drawings and Stencils.
Automatic Layouts capable of arranging large diagrams.
Customizable Ribbon and Command Bar interfaces.
OpenGL hardware acceleration.

description.p: High-performance Data Grid component for displaying and editing tabular and hierarhical data.

ul.li: Binding to a diverse set of data sources
Built-in support for Filtering, Grouping and Sorting
Master-Detail and Hierarchical views
Frozen rows and columns, resizable rows
Inplace editing and null values support
Conditional column formatting
OpenGL hardware acceleration.

description.p: Advanced text processing component that helps you deliver Microsoft Word-like functionality in your applications.

ul.li: Advanced Paragraph and Rich-Text formatting
Bullet Lists and Nested Bullet Lists with auto numbering
Multiple-Columns
HTML-like Tables
Microsoft Word Compatiblity – open, edit and save Word documents.
Printing and PDF export.
Customizable Ribbon and Command Bar interfaces.
OpenGL hardware acceleration.

description.p: Advanced Schedule component for showing and organizing appointments and recurring events.

ul.li: 5 view modes: Day, Work Week, Week, Month and Timeline
Appointments and recurring events
Appointment categories and tags
Time indicators
Grouping
Fully customizable ribbon and command bars (menus and toolbars) commanding interfaces
iCalender file format (ICS) support for both import and export

description.p: NOV Gauge for .NET has extensive support for instrumentation widgets such as radial (circular) and linear gauges, knobs, indicators and numeric displays.
Advanced Barcode component for large range or linear (1D) and matrix (2D) barcodes.

ul.li: Support for 28 linear (1D) barcode symbologies: Code 39, Code 93, Code 128, EAN-13, EAN-8, ISBN, UPC-A and many more
Support for 3 matrix (2D) barcode symbologies: QR Code, Data Matrix, PDF 417
Export of barcodes to wide range of vector and raster images
Import of barcodes into all other NOV components: chart, diagram, rich text editor, schedule, grid and so on
Fully customizable barcode appearance

description.p: Complete UI Toolkit providing all the necessary widgets for creating advanced, cross-platform User Interfaces.

ul.li: Ribbon and Command Bars Commanding Interfaces
Buttons - Button, Check Box, Radio Button, etc.
Text Controls - Label, Text Box, Auto-Complete Text Box
Drop Down Edits - Combo Box, Date Time Box, Color Box, etc.
Layout Panels - Stack, Dock, Flow, Flexbox etc.
Numerous predefined themes. Styleable with CSS.
OpenGL hardware acceleration.

description.p: The solid foundation that is needed to build advanced components for Web, Windows, and Mac.

ul.li: OpenGL hardware accelerated 2D and 3D Graphics
Imaging - support for .PNG, .JPEG, .BMP, .GIF encoding-decoding, etc.
Common DOM (Document Object Model) for all components
Styling with Cascade Style Sheets
Serialization with Backward and Forward compatibility
Data Structures - implementation of list, map, stack, queue etc.
DOM Editors - automatic UI for all DOM elements
